Header.paragraph: Ratu Digital is an IT Provider that can help businesses in digital transformation through strategy, product development, and creative communication.

About.paragraph: Ratu Digital is dedicated to becoming a company that can provide its clients with the best IT solutions and services. We are also seriously developing IT products and services to meet the needs of the IT industry so that we are expected to contribute to increasing the advancement of IT technology in Indonesia. Our focus is on quality results and customer satisfaction. Therefore, we make continuous improvements to improve the quality of our human resources, business processes, and the quality of the services and products we produce..

Services.name: Open Class: Microservice Architecture for Business
Services.text: Microservice as the word suggests the word 'Micro' means small and the word 'Service' means modular service that runs a process and lightweight mechanism to serve a certain goal.

Services.name: Open Class: Language Database
Services.text: Databases are essential for many individuals and companies, providing a practical way to organize and store information on a computer. In programming, developers use database languages to maintain and monitor an electronic database and its management system.

Services.name: Close Class: Metaverse 3D Design
Services.text: We will model an extraordinary 3D fantasy land in this academy with you. We will get to know the Blender 3D program, and then we will make perfect models. This course is an excellent resource for anyone who loves to learn and wants to improve their 3D modelling field.

Services.name: Close Class: Digital Marketing
Services.text: Digital Marketing Program prepares students to maximize marketing through digital platforms, such as social media, websites, etc. In this class, you will be encouraged to explore the principles of digital marketing and projects using digital media according to the trends and needs of the target.

Services.name: Close Class: Data Analytics
Services.text: The student will be introduced to the foundation of understanding and applying algorithms in programming, data structure, and the concept of objects.

Services.name: Close Class: Business Development
Services.text: The entrepreneurship development program aims to foster and assist students who already have a business or are just starting a business so that their company develops and is sustainable. Students' business development and sustainability are highly expected because students have carried out many companies with exciting ideas and creativity.

Contact.address: Belleza BSA, 1st Floor Unit 106, Jl. Letjen Soepeno, Grogol Utara, Kebayoran Lama, Jakarta Selatan 12210

Features.title: Microsoft 365
Features.text: Increase your team's productivity with Microsoft 365 by making your users' work more accessible.

Features.title: Microsoft Cloud Azure
Features.text: You can use Microsoft's data centre and backup centre to create an environment that requires as many resources as you need.

Features.title: Data Center
Features.text: Mini data centre planning and construction services are integral to our expertise in developing information technology infrastructure.

Features.title: Academy
Features.text: Academy is a premium technology-based online academy designed to create professionals in the IT department. Students will learn with real case studies guided by experienced tutors.
